md:
giải nghĩa từ "showing" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Showing** (verb)

* Meaning: to display or exhibit something so that it can be seen or noticed
* Example sentence: The museum is showing a new exhibit on ancient civilizations.
* Related words: display, exhibit, demonstrate, present

**Showing** (noun)

* Meaning: a display or exhibition of something
* Example sentence: The showing of the new movie was a huge success.
* Related words: display, exhibition, presentation, screening

**Showing** (adjective)

* Meaning: being exhibited or displayed
* Example sentence: The showing artwork was impressive.
* Related words: exhibited, displayed, presented, showcased
html:

Showing (verb)

  • Meaning: to display or exhibit something so that it can be seen or noticed
  • Example sentence: The museum is showing a new exhibit on ancient civilizations.

Showing (noun)

  • Meaning: a display or exhibition of something
  • Example sentence: The showing of the new movie was a huge success.

Showing (adjective)
